==Plunging Trial==
Unlocks: 2021-05-21 10:00:00

Mechanisms that are difficult to traverse have been laid all across the ground here. Since you've already leaped from high heights, why not use a few more {{Color|help|Plunging Attacks}}?

;Ley Line Disorder
* When {{Color|help|Plunging Attacks}} hit opponents, each opponent hit will increase the ATK of all characters in your own party by 6% for 30s. A maximum of 60% ATK can be gained this way.
* All party members' {{Color|help|Plunging Attacks}} DMG increased by 120%.

;Main Opponents

Level 90 enemies: {{Enemy List|Fatui Pyro Agent;Fatui Electro Cicin Mage;Treasure Hoarders: Gravedigger;Treasure Hoarders: Seaman;Treasure Hoarders: Pugilist}}

Level 80 enemies: {{Enemy List|Hilichurl Fighter;Hilichurl Berserker;Hilichurl Grenadier;Blazing Axe Mitachurl;Treasure Hoarders: Pyro Potioneer;Treasure Hoarders: Cryo Potioneer;Treasure Hoarders: Crusher;Treasure Hoarders: Seaman;Treasure Hoarders: Pugilist;Fatui Electro Cicin Mage;Large Geo Slime;Large Pyro Slime;Pyro Slime}}

;Trial Quest

| {{Card|Primogem|70}}
|-
| Complete the Plunging Trial once while completing at least 5 mechanism challenges (not including the Final Challenge).

==Healing Trial==
Unlocks: 2021-05-21 10:00:00

Injuries that are hard to avoid will accumulate here. Place characters with {{Color|help|healing abilities}} into the team to make the fight go easier.

;Ley Line Disorder
*When active character's {{Color|help|HP is greater than 90%}}, DMG dealt is increased by 50%.
*When an active character {{Color|help|regenerates HP}}, they will regenerate 3 Energy for all characters in your own party. This effect can be triggered once every 1.5s.

;Main Opponents

Level 90 enemies: {{Enemy List|Pyro Abyss Mage;Blazing Axe Mitachurl}}

Level 80 enemies: {{Enemy List|Geovishap;Fatui Pyroslinger Bracer;Fatui Anemoboxer Vanguard;Fatui Geochanter Bracer;Cryo Hilichurl Shooter;Blazing Axe Mitachurl}}

==Melee Trial==
Unlocks: 2021-05-23 4:00:00

Melee attacks are enhanced here. Bring characters of this kind and beat your foes in {{Color|help|glorious hand-to-hand combat}}!

;Ley Line Disorder
*If the character wields a {{Color|help|Sword, Claymore or Polearm}}, {{Color|help|Normal and Charged Attacks}} deal 75% increased DMG.
*If the character wields a {{Color|help|Sword, Claymore or Polearm}}, {{Color|help|Normal and Charged Attacks}} will unleash shockwaves when they hit opponents, dealing AoE DMG. These shockwaves can be triggered in this manner every 2s.

==Ranged Trial==
Unlocks: 2021-05-23 4:00:00

If your opponents get too close, your characters will lose their enhancements here. Bring {{Color|help|ranged characters}} and stop them before they can close the gap.

;Ley Line Disorder
*When {{Color|help|there are no opponents}} around your current character, the DMG dealt by all characters in your party is increased by 75%.
*When {{Color|help|there are no opponents}} around your current character, Movement SPD is increased by 20%, and Sprinting and Alternative Sprint Stamina consumption is decreased by 50%.

;Main Opponents
Level 90 enemies:
* {{Enemy|Ruin Grader}}

==Shield Trial==
Unlocks: 2021-05-25 4:00:00

Injuries that cause interruption will be hard to avoid here. Use {{Color|help|shields}} to protect yourself and help combat go more smoothly.

;Ley Line Disorder
*While {{Color|help|protected by a shield}}, the DMG dealt by characters is increased by 50%.
* When a character {{Color|help|obtains an Elemental Shard created from a Geo Reaction}} they will unleash a shockwave that deals DMG to opponents in an AoE. A shockwave can be triggered once every 1s.

;Main Opponents

Level 90 enemies: {{Enemy List|Stonehide Lawachurl;Geovishap Hatchling}}

==Elemental Trial==
Unlocks: 2021-05-25 4:00

The effects of {{Color|help|Elemental Reactions}} are incredibly powerful here, so trigger them as much as possible!

;Ley Line Disorder
*All party members' {{Color|help|Elemental Mastery}} is increased by 300.
*When a character {{Color|help|triggers an Elemental Reaction on a nearby opponent}}, it will trigger a shockwave at that opponent's position that deals DMG. A shockwave can be triggered in this manner every 1s.

;Main Opponents
